title: Ticket #2505: Dedicated scheduler sets wrong MyType for submitter ads
description:
Prior to 7.3.2, submitter ads had a MyType of "Scheduler" when sent over the wire. In 7.3.2, this was changed for regular submitter ads, which started having a MyType of "Submitter". Submitter ads from the dedicated scheduler were missed in this change, and continued to have a MyType of "Scheduler".

Before we can remove a set of backwards-compatibility checks for the old behavior, we need to fix it for dedicated scheduler submitter ads.
check_ins: 2011-Sep-27 15:19   Check-in [27437]: Fix MyType in submitter ads from the dedicated scheduler. #2505 In Condor 7.3.2, the MyType of regular submitter ads was changed from "Scheduler" to "Submitter". Make the same change for submitter ads from the dedicated scheduler. ===VersionHistory:None=== (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
